backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented perfume‑site features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Types, Reviews, and Top Picks using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Shared layout providing header navigation, responsive menus, and footer wrapping routed pages.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewCa: Reusable card displaying detailed perfume review data including scent notes, performance, and pros/cons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and Internet Identity login/clear logic using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for query hooks with no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode values, and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, introductory content, and navigation cards for main site sections.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Contains the PerfumeReview interface and a list of review data rendered via ReviewCard components.
frontend/src/pages/TopPicksBrandsPage.ts: Displays seasonal fragrance picks, beginner suggestions, and notable perfume houses using cards and tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/TypesGuidePage.tsx: Presents fragrance families and concentration types with descriptive details using cards, tables, and accordions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, containers, and plugins for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata for a static 4–5 page perfume website, listing required images, existing features, and new feature requests. Provides overall project description, versioning, and structural notes.
